Research

Our overarching goal

Our he learned his trade in Seamus Davis’ SI-STM lab and with Felix Baumberger, and later moved as an ETH fellow to Andreas Wallraff’s qudev lab where he investigated coupled cavity arrays in circuit QED. We further have group members with different background and interests, working together on physics and instrumentation.
